title: ISic001551. I.Sicily inscription 001551
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΜΑΡΧΟΣΣΗΜΒΡΟΝΙΣ
2ΗΡΩΣΑΓΑΘΟΣ

Apparatus criticus

  • text checked against photograph in Vento;
  • line.1: Kretschmer: Μάρχιος (mislead by part of the decoration); Manni Piraino: Σημβρῶνις

translation

commentary
